title: Please discuss Patch 5.2's effect on Mid laners with me
body:
So obviously, patch isn't actually out yet, so none of us can say anything final until we play on it. But my god all of this feels really massive. Let's talk specific Mid Laners champ by champ. 

**Ahri.** Technically, this was a nerf and a buff, but it overall feels like a buff. Even though the 20% damage increase was removed from her charm, they at least increased the damage on it as they did with Fox-Fire. They also gave her more utility on her Q. It kinda feels like Ahri won't be so much of an assassin anymore but a kite-y teamfighting Mage. Previous Ahri was incredibly dependant on her charm to zero someone out, now that's not really the case anymore. Of course the removal of DFG would hurt her but I think building her Morello's into Deathcap like all other mages would work just fine. On paper, on a personal level anyway, she feels like one of the stronger mid laners coming out of this patch.

**Fizz. **They nerfed his Q HARD. And they did the same thing to his W. Like, ZERO AP ratios on it?! Now, the 20% damage increase that they added to his ult is really nice and I think that overall, his damage will be higher to the targets his Fish hits. And since it can only mark ONE target and plus with all the devastating nerfs to his Q and W, Fizz kinda feels like a Zed now. Hit one person with Chum the Waters, blow them up, be useless. And on the rare occasion that your fish hits no one? Well... Yeah.... Fizz feels like he took a really big hit in this patch and I'm not entirely sure if he'll still be viable... That makes me sad :(

**Lissandra.** Now, I don't know anyone but me who rushed a DFG on Liss, but for anyone else who did, they'll know how strong it was. I did this since big scale teamfights didn't really happen until later on in the game so I generally just wanted to Ult the priority targets and blow them up. And with DFG the roams and the assassinations were massive. Even your laning opponents would drop like flies and snowballing into the late game was easier than normal. With the removal of DFG, I feel like Lissandra is another one who took a blow but at least her actual numbers remain untouched, and I'd still wanna play her lots, but I'm not a fan of the ROA build. I don't like that item on any midlaner to be completely honest. Would a normal Morello's into Deathcap be fine?

**Syndra. **Not much happened to Syndra, I was never a fan of DFG on Syndra because it felt so unnecessary. The DFG was absolutely NOT needed on Syndra to blow someone up. But I wanna talk about her Q and Stun nerfs. Her Q nerfs honestly felt fine. I never harassed all THAT much with it anyway and the damage on it even before the nerfs felt really lackluster in the early levels. But her Q+E is the big one. I've barely been able to land these, obviously you could just call me a scrub "git gud" but I use to always land them, and then being able to land close to none?.... I just really hope the slight buff they're returning to the stun makes it hittable again. If the stun is fixed, I feel like Syndra would come out of 5.2, a really good pick, like she's always been. Because at the moment, she feels IMMENSELY clunky.

**Nidalee.** I don't have much to say about Nidalee as I've never played her. But people are saying that is currently one of the stronger mid laners. Anyone?

**Zed.** The nerfs to Zed didn't really feel like they were too bad. Just hurts his split pushing a little and his dueling with Death Mark on cooldown. BORK and Ghostblade are usually core on him anyway and I feel like he won't be coming out of this too bad.

**Akali.** These nerfs feel like they won't do anything.... Like, it feels like she's still to be the most op pieces of sh*t on the planet.

**Annie**. I feel like she too took a massive blow. I've only played Annie mid once so I can't offer too much but what do you guys think on the Tibbers/Molten Shield buff? It doesn't feel like it'll do anything huge...

**Azir. **Azir didn't actually get a buff, but with all these champs taking massive blows, I feel like maybe Azir will be stepping up to the plate as a super duper strong pick. Thoughts?

I know I wrote ALOT but when I read the patch, it just really got me thinking that's all. I'd really love to discuss this with people who actually care about this and know a lot more about it than I do. It'd be great if people could offer up some thoughts AFTER that they've played these champs too.

replies.body:
I'm quite worried about Akali honestly. 
She's only "one of the most OP pieces of sh*T on this planet" if she does well early game: her jg makes sure to camp and help her out and her roaming lands her some nice kills.
Otherwise, she gets extremely behind; she's just one of those champs who either snowballs so damn hard or drops off really hard. 

I guess she hasn't been nerfed too much... but since she's already countered so much and has such a squishy build, I really feel like they couldve at least kept the distance on her dash. As for the E not going to be able to proc her Q passive anymore, it's not too much of a nerf in general, it just makes it harder for the PLAYER because unless you make sure you get that AA in, a HUGE chunk of that "OP" burst damage is gone. 

This is coming from an Akali main, of course I'd feel bad. After all you never know, little things can make big changes.

Hey,

I moved this to the Gameplay & Strategy subboard, cause this is talking about gameplay =P

Personally I really like the Ahri and Annie changes. I much prefer getting different and diverse gameplay, rather than just more assassins. enhancing the unique aspects of Annie and Ahri seems like a really cool direction to me. 

I can't comment too much on the other champions as I don't play them as much. But I think with the removal of DFG champions that used it will see compensations buffs if they are assassins or buffs in unique areas to emphasize each champions traits.

Do you guys watch the Patch Rundown by any chance? There's usually a lot of great insight and this week they have Scarizard, Morello and Voyboy discussing the latest changes.

http://youtu.be/Tcwa5_r3MQM
I've played with you so much in solo q marauder :)

flat movespeed quints, 3 in utility movespeed and gank from level 2

> [{quoted}](name=Devil God King,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-01-29T04:42:57.789+0000)

Huh?

6% increase in movespeed and start boots every single game. mid position classicaly is the position from which the map must be controlled. roams at level 2, no waiting for river runes to spawn in lol. roam hard work with jungle

> [{quoted}](name=Devil God King,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T07:33:07.195+0000)
>
> 6% increase in movespeed and start boots every single game. mid position classicaly is the position from which the map must be controlled. roams at level 2, no waiting for river runes to spawn in lol. roam hard work with jungle

Doesn't sound like the best idea, to be honest. If your ganks fail as they could easily do at level two, your enemy laner could get an easy gold advantage.

> [{quoted}](name=Devil God King,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=000a0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T10:07:42.607+0000)
>
> you povo piece of %%%% you got to risk high stakes for high rewards eat %%%% and die go kill yourself %%%%%% %%%%ing noob %%%% eat %%%% %%%%%% EAT %%%% AND DIE SLOW YOU %%%% DIE IN PAIN LONG SLOW DEATH YOU %%%%ING %%%%%% CLULESS AUTISTIC %%%% TRY SOMETHING NEW YOU %%%%ING %%%%%% OR  A%%%%ING STRAT IVE BEEN RUNNING FOR 7 YEARS AT AN ELITE TIER LEVEL. gold is nothing in this game the map is oversaturated with gold if ur opponent getting a 10 creep advantage sub 10 minutes over you setting up full map control is your issue maybe you should try a different game, i don't know what though you cant get much lower then this

That's even more aggressive than the play you have proposed. If you know you can get something out of a gank, no matter how early it is, that is a good thing. However, more often than not, to execute a level 2 gank with the setup you have described you are giving your opposing laner a CS and level advantage when you make that gank against people who quite likely are not in position for it. In addition, you are sacrificing a lot of your early game power by changing those runes to movespeed on every midlaner in existence. If your enemy laner pings that you have left the lane too, the other laners may prepare for your presence. At level two, no one on your team should be tower diving to secure a kill if needed, lowering your chances of getting gold and xp out of that gank even more. It sounds like you are tipping the balance of power over to the enemy team. You say you have been doing this at an elite tier level, but you are Bronze V and seem to only play Pantheon, according to the match history shown on LoLKing.

Meanwhile, you tell me to try something new. Well, I play AD Lulu support, jungle Karma and mid Gangplank from time to time. In addition, I have tried many off-meta picks like bloody support Sion and ADC Lulu.
Lulu... everywhere.

While this ganking from level two idea of yours might work for you, its working in Bronze V, which is not reflective of the rest of the ELOs.

lol you autistic %%%%%% stfu you're embarressing yourself


i rome map from lvl 2

To be honest, the only person who ought to feel embarrassed (please invest in software to check your typing for mistakes) is you for both your poor grammar and your toxicity. I could be wrong, but you aren't holding up your side of the debate well. All I'm getting is "stfu" and "autistic". Well, I have an autistic friend who is amazing at tabletop strategy games and is much more pleasant than you, so I'm not sure how autistic is meant to apply. If I am autistic, however, and you see all autistic people as idiots, I would like for you to contrast how you are speaking to how I am speaking. If you do not understand what I mean by that, let me rephrase this. If I have mental difficulties which impact upon my intelligence, and you display a much lower intelligence than me, then which disorders do you suffer from?
I would like for you to properly argue the merits of roaming at level two, and share where it has brought you success. However, since you have been so rude to me I would have to doubt any anecdotal evidence you bring before me.
However, if you have nothing to bring to the table of this discussion, I would rather you leave. What I want to hear right now is people's experiences in the new patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Devil God King,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=000a00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-29T12:07:21.862+0000)
>

I kinda hope the Red who commented reads all of this. If he/she does, I would like him/her to clear all traces of our conversation because it is counterproductive to a discussion on gameplay.
Stop being such a tool and just say "they" or "them".

Nidalee buffs make her a lot stronger, you thought that she was slippery before?  Well now she is going over to that jungle camp to say goodbye.

Honestly the Ahri hit was definitely a nerf, Sure she can kite harder, and is now going to be building CDR, but she has lost a crap load in the removal of DFG and her Charm bonus damage, i honestly hope they see to putting her Charm bonus damage back on.

Annie that's a massive buff, the only change is a *slight* nerf to her shield, for a massive buff to her tibbers, the biggest thing to remember is if your tibbers is being hit with AA's while you have shield up, get out of tower range.

Also as a note, Veigar has been hit, but honestly DFG was never a full on core item on him in my opinion, if your not 100-0ing with your Ult>Q>W combo, then your not farming well enough and need to work on it.

For me personally it just removes Ahri from my midlane pool and moves Nidalee up to my main mid laner.

not much of an annie player i see...
the biggest thing to remember is if your tibbers is being hit with AA's while you have shield up, get out of tower range.

if tibbers even LOOKS at an enemy champ while you are in tower range...even if tibbers is OUT of tower range, you already get focused by tower. one of the most annoying things. its like if shaco clone/morde ult clone/even LB clone. if they are under tower hitting people, or hitting people outside tower range....the pet gets aimed...not the real one. same for malz rats and heimer turrets and zyra plants and teemo shrooms. if any of those cause damage to people under tower...owner doesnt get focused....but hey, a little girl gets hit if her bear is too close to people.

The difference being it's a bigger trigger range (rather then just worrying about tibber's AoE burn, you have to worry about AA's ontop of that, and if an ADC hit's tibbers he can be well out of AoE range)

And to be completely honest, I like these changes to Ahri... I never like her as an Assassin anyway since it wasn't very easy to get to the priority targets in teamfights and I alwayd liked her as more of a mage so we'll how it goes but I like this a lot.
Well yeah i haven't been on for a while, but it seems the changes to ahri have made her shine (57% win rate) but there are nerfs being lined up for her due to it which will bring her back down.

lol How does this have anything to do with the Mid lane champion pool changes?

And dude do you that the Mid laner should roam at level 2?...
{{champion:268}}  is the one of the strongest mid laners atm. FREELO
Akali isn't near the level of %%%%ing Zed, she's a subpar Assassin who can only kill people out of position, she has more counters than any other assassin.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-28T12:52:02.963+0000)
>
> Akali isn't near the level of %%%%ing Zed, she's a subpar Assassin who can only kill people out of position, she has more counters than any other assassin.

Zed only has more outplay potential and fulfils the role of "assassin" more perfectly because he can be in and out in the blink of an eye. But Akali is a train that absolutely cannot be stopped once she picks up a couple of kills, due to her Stealth and seemingly infinite dashes. Also she takes a LOT less skill than Zed. And yeah she has a rough laning phase but no matter how bad it was, a couple of roams and you're unstoppable again.

I don't know if these nerfs will fix that, we'll have to see.

Tibbers/Molten Shield buff? It doesn't feel like it'll do anything huge...
as an annie player, that is massive. it makes tibbers a bit tankier, and gives a way to close a gap when people flash away from tibbers (the speed boost on tibbers when you use molten) basically it also helps to show what an annie combo should look like. instead of just spamming %%%% on CD. now you use R stun, and QWQ and save E for chasing or if tibbers under a tower. and spam E when tibbers is taking damage. no more will people spam hit tibbers either. or they might die. what he also needs, is when you get a sunfire/thornmail. if item effects work on tibbers too! would be nice.

ahri mage now...azir still OP.

the soldier placement for Azir was actually a major buff, you have no idea how the old problem would lose you so many kills while chasing.
now we just need his damage nerfed so that he isn't 50% banned in ranked :(

They hit a lot of assassins hard, yet didn't do much for Zed when they hyped up his incoming balance changes. I want to see something more for Zed next patch. I don't play Zed, and I don't think I ever really have though, so I'm not too familiar with his workings and ratios to give a good comment. I see him getting more play now that a lot of the AP Assassins have suffered though. This bothers me a little bit. He already has a pretty high play rate, and I am sick of games with two Zeds popping up in normals because it happens a lot. I have nothing big against playing against a Zed, but my problem is playing against one all the time.

The Fizz changes don't bother me, since I have had many moments of frustration against Fizz. I think having the missing health damage on his autos not always on is good. Also, if you are going to be taking heaps of damage for being low on health, I think you kinda need to not have grievous wounds if you want to try and survive. All in all, that was a healthy nerf. The change on his ult doesn't bother me. In fact, I am glad they included that. I don't like Fizz, but the change on his ult means that Fizz is still gonna be viable, and no changes to champions should make them unviable.
However, it confuses me a little that they changed his ult like that after getting rid of DFG, at the same time that they remove Ahri's magic damage amplification on her charm. I think Ahri might need a little bit of damage tweaking with her bonus charm damage, but let's see how she fairs once the patch is in, because I could be wrong.

I'd like to see what happens with Nidalee and her play rate. She is a champion I like to see. I feel like her changes will make more people try her in the jungle, as I have heard has happened a lot, yet I have never seen. Even if she isn't a jungler and is a midlaner though, the changes for her hunt, if used properly, can help her get between lanes faster if she wants to pull off some ganks, as midlaners should.

For Annie however, I feel the removal of DFG can hit her hard. However, her utility remains as good as ever, if not better. I don't like the changes in values they made for her shield though, and I see myself picking up an early second point because 10 armour and magic resist isn't gonna make me feel safe enough for those times I need it. Let's talk about what it does on Tibbers though. The armour and magic resist on Tibbers is something I am indifferent about. I like the speed he gets though, as sometimes I really need to have him somewhere and he isn't there!

I want to mention mid lane AP Trist...
RIP.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yxAG7yse,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T12:36:09.364+0000)

> However, it confuses me a little that they changed his ult like that after getting rid of DFG, at the same time that they remove Ahri's magic damage amplification on her charm. I think Ahri might need a little bit of damage tweaking with her bonus charm damage, but let's see how she fairs once the patch is in, because I could be wrong.

I feel like her changes will make more people try her in the jungle, as I have heard has happened a lot, yet I have never seen. Even if she isn't a jungler and is a midlaner though, the changes for her hunt, if used properly, can help her get between lanes faster if she wants to pull off some ganks, as midlaners should.
> 
> For Annie however, I feel the removal of DFG can hit her hard. However, her utility remains as good as ever, if not better. I don't like the changes in values they made for her shield though, and I see myself picking up an early second point because 10 armour and magic resist isn't gonna make me feel safe enough for those times I need it. Let's talk about what it does on Tibbers though. The armour and magic resist on Tibbers is something I am indifferent about. I like the speed he gets though, as sometimes I really need to have him somewhere and he isn't there!
> 
> I want to mention mid lane AP Trist...
> RIP.

I agree with the Zed nerf, it didn't feel like it'd do much at all.

In my original post, I mentioned that Fizz is kinda of like Zed now, blow up one champ and thats it. Except, he doesn't have an easy way out like Zed does... I don't know.. I don't think I'm gonna be playing Fizz anymore nor do I think I'm gonna see many Fizz's now.

Yeah MIDalee's actually being banned in the LCS as of late, I'm gonna have to check that out.

And as for Annie, I feel like Tibbers speed buff won't be utilised by anyone since the E is normally just there to charge her stun

I use the E to charge the stun a lot too, which I do think is its main purpose. However, after placing Tibbers you still want to charge stuns and it can be useful to reposition Tibbers, especially if another stun is coming up. I want to see how it works in game though. I'm wondering how strong the movespeed change is gonna be.
